text: Adrien Nicholas Brody (born April 14, 1973) is an American actor. He starred in Roman Polanski's The Pianist (2002). The role won him an Academy Award for Best Actor, the youngest actor ever to win the award. In 2025, he won another Academy Award for Best Actor for his role in The Brutalist (2024). His mother, Sylvia Plachy (born 1943) is a Hungarian photographer.
